channel.title: IRC bot question
channel.description:
[s]* Fat_Cookies (steve@ballmer.ubuntu.com) has joined #moparscape [Fat_Cookies] U WAN BAN!?!??!??!?!? * Taharok sets mode +a #moparscape Fat_Cookies * Taharok gives channel operator status to Fat_Cookies wow this is cool shit how does the bot go [Fat_Cookies] U WAN BAN!?!??!??!?!?[/s]
[s]Can I do it on my channel on the irc.moparisthebest.com server?[/s] Never mind, Jorsa told me already.
